insults: You've got room temperature IQ
You're the human equivalent of a participation trophy.
If you were a spice, you'd be flour.
I smell something burning, are you trying to think again?
You're as useless as the “ueue” in “queue.”
It's great to see that you don't let education get in the way of your ignorance.
I'm proud of you. You've never succumbed to beauty standards!
Stupidity is not a crime, you're free to go.
You look easy to draw.
I'll never forget the first time we met, but I'll keep trying.
Honestly, I'm just impressed you can even read this.
You look like a ”before” picture.
You're proof that evolution is bulls*it.
If ignorance is bliss, you must be ecstatic at all times.
You'd fail a personality test.
You'll go far someday, I hope you stay there.
Even Bob Ross would call you a mistake.
I expect nothing of you, and still get disappointed.
I'd smack you, but I'm against animal abuse.
Where's your off button?
Whoever told you to be yourself gave you bad advice.
Hurting you is the least thing I want to do… but it's still on the list.
I told my therapist about you; she didn't believe me.
